column6: Na Otumfo no a oeyi me kra awerɛhow no

column2: "Na mber dodow a nkwa da ho wɔ mo mu
column3: Na Nyankopɔn nkwahwea wɔ m'ahwentokura mu yi;"
Nkyii so me tɛkyerɛma nnkɔbɔ ndaadaa dzin."

column2: "Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ mubobu hom bem: Mirinnyi m'emudzi mmfi moho araa ma ekodu dɛ mubowu."

column3: na mirinngyaa mu: M'akoma nnsopa me mber tsentsen a metse ase yi."
Wɔmma nyia ɔsoɛr tsia me no nyɛ dɛ brakyewnyi."
aber a Nyankopɔn etwa no do
column4: Aber a oeyi ne kra kɔ no?"

column3: Aber a ɔfona bɛba no do no?"

column2: "Ana no ho bɛsɛpɛw no wɔ Otumfo no ho
column3: Na ɔafrɛ Nyankopɔn mber nyinara mu?"

column2: "Mebɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom wɔ Nyankopɔn nsa do; Dza ɔwɔ Otumfo ho no mirinnsiw do."

column3: hom nyinara hom ehu; Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ayɛ gyan dɛm yi?"

column2: "Iyi nye nyimpa dzebɔnyɛnyi ne kyɛpɛn a onya no wɔ Nyankopɔn hɔ
column3: Na ahyɛdofo egyapadze a wonya no wɔ Otumfo no hɔ."
wɔdɔr ma afona; Na ne yafumba no

column2: "Hɔn a wofi mu bɛka no wobesie hɔn wɔ owu mu
column3: Na ne mbaa ekunafo runntwa sukwadwom."

column2: "Sɛ ɔpra dwetɛ hyɛ kuw dɛ huntuma
column3: Na osiesie ntar dɛ dɛtse mpo a;"

column4: na mbom ɔtseneneenyi na ɔdze bɛhyɛ
column5: Na nyia odzi bem no na ɔbɛkyɛ dwetɛ no mu."

column3: Na ɔtse dɛ pata a ɔweɔmfo bɔ."
naaso ɔnnkɔsoɛr dɛm bio; Obobue n'enyiwa no

column2: "Ihu fa no dɛ nsu; Anadwe na ehum wia no kɔ."

column3: na ofi hɔ kɔ; Na ɔpra no fi ne tsenabew."
na ɔrenngye no nkwa: Onya pɛ dɛ oguan fi ne nsamu."

column2: "Nkorɔfo bɔbobɔ hɔn nsamu egu no do
column3: Na wɔabobɔ no do nhwiroma etu no efi ne tsenabew akɔ."
